property.name: jobmanager.archive.fs.dir
property.description: Directory to upload information about terminated jobs to. You have to add this directory to the list of monitored directories of the history server via historyserver.archive.fs.dir.

property.name: historyserver.archive.fs.dir
property.description: Comma separated list of directories to fetch archived jobs from. The history server will monitor these directories for archived jobs. You can configure the JobManager to archive jobs to a directory via jobmanager.archive.fs.dir.

property.name: historyserver.archive.fs.refresh-interval
property.description: Interval in milliseconds for refreshing the archived job directories.
